## lazyAssert() function

Assert function with a message that is generated on demand.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function lazyAssert(value: boolean, makeMessage: () => string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | boolean | The value to be asserted to be true. |
|  makeMessage | () =&gt; string | Function to generate the error message, should the value be false. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Example


```javascript
lazyAssert(obj?.foo?.bar, () => `Object is missing foo.bar. Full object: ${JSON.stringify(obj)}`);

```
